author: 4d8c
content: > is [there] a world where supply is large enough for any demand?

author: sky.cactus
content: In theory, yes.  Practically no.  There is likely always going to be a supply constraint that limits usage to those most willing to pay to use the system.

author: sky.cactus
content: Just like with some goods in a traditional market, technological advances may be able to reach high enough levels of supply that most people are willing to pay the cost to use the system.
